pageProduct.name: Wagner Professional Ultimate Zinc Sustain 60 Vegetarian Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Ultimate Zinc Sustain

Warnings

WARNING: The recommended daily amount of Vitamin A from all sources is 700 micrograms retinol equivalents for women and 900 micrograms retinol equivalents for men. Contains Zinc which may be dangerous if taken in large amounts or for a long period of time. Vitamins and minerals can only be of assistance if dietary intake is inadequate. Do not use if cap seal or if inner seal is missing, torn or broken. CONTAINS NO: Wheat, gluten, yeast, dairy products, egg, artificial flavours or preservatives.

Common Uses

Ultimate Zinc Sustain contains a high strength 35 mg of elemental zinc, in an easy to take one capsule daily dose. Zinc maintains healthy immune system function, maintains skin health and supports healthy reproductive hormones in males. Supplementing with Ultimate Zinc Sustain will maintain zinc levels in the body. This formula contains: • 35 mg of elemental Zinc • Convenience of a one capsule daily dose • Zinc to maintain healthy immune system function • Zinc to maintain skin health • Zinc to support healthy reproductive hormones in males

Ingredients

ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: Each hard capsule contains inc glycinate 115.5 mg equiv. to Zinc 35 mg Calcium ascorbate dihydrate 121.7 mg equiv. to Ascorbic acid (Vitamin C) 100 mg Vitamin A (2,500IU) equiv. to Retinol acetate 750 micrograms retinol equivalents Magnesium amino acid chelate 100 mg equiv. to Magnesium 20 mg Pyridoxine hydrochloride 35 mg equiv. to Pyridoxine (Vitamin B6) 28.8 mg Taurine 50 mg

Directions

RECOMMENDED DOSAGE: WARNING: If you are pregnant – or considering becoming pregnant – do not take Vitamin A supplements without consulting your doctor or pharmacist. When taken in excess of 3000 micrograms retinol equivalents – Vitamin A can cause birth defects. Adults: Take 1 hard capsule with water, once daily. Or as directed by your healthcare professional.
